## `SetPlotBackgroundImageOpacity`

Sets the graph background\index{images!graph backgrounds} (plot area) image opacity for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetPlotBackgroundImageOpacity(number opacity)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` opacity | The opacity level to apply to the image. |
:::
